Bibliographic References: Kat. Hamburg, p. 384, no. 332; M u M , Cat. 56, 19 Feb. 1980, no. 120; F. Mutmann , Der Granatapfel, p. 90, fig. 75
Imagery Description: Orestes with drawn sword and Electra, wearing black peplos, holding hydria by the tomb of Agamemnon (= white Ionic column on square base). Ext.: berried laurel.
Artist: The Painter of Naples 2585 and his circle
